extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Implementation

        public Implementation(IGame game,
                      ICamera camera,
                      IRendererMaster renderer,
                      int fpsLimit)
        Creates a new implementation of the engine and game loop.
        Parameters:
        game - The game to be run with the engine.
        camera - The main camera to use.
        renderer - The master renderer to render with.
        fpsLimit - The maximum FPS the engine can render at.
